name: Espresso Escape-o
description:
Game Description:

A coffee bean tries to escape from espresso machines that are out to turn it into delicious coffee! Help this bean survive in these kitchen mazes and get it to safety. 

How to Play:

WASD : Player Movement

Shift: Shield Protection (with sufficient MP)

Ctrl: Speed Boost (with sufficient Sugar Levels)

Credits:

Level Designers and Scripters: Jiaxin Huang, Nat Briceno, Jaclyn Ngo, Xiaowen Huang

#SDCT
